resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

Bulk mode: barcode scanned and saved
Sorry, the Android camera encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device.
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
Could not encode a barcode from the data provided.
Sorry, the requested application could not be launched. The barcode contents may be invalid.
Sorry, this book is not searchable.
Sorry, the search encountered a problem.
You can share data by displaying a barcode on your screen and scanning it with another phone.
Or type some text and press Enter
Sorry, the SD card is not accessible.
Scan and save many barcodes continuously
Improves scanning in low light on some phones, but may cause glare. Does not work on all phones.
Scan for white barcodes on black background. Not available on some devices.
Store multiple scans of the same barcode in History
Try to retrieve more information about the barcode contents
Available from abroad and any national provider at standard charges
There are already personal templates saved for this IBAN
There are already personal templates saved for this supplier
The barcode could not be scanned. Please try again.
Point the scanner at the barcode
Ask for help or info through e-mail.
Toll free from any national provider. Select key 1 for private individuals and key 2 for companies.
There are no personal templates defined for this current account.
Are you sure you want to deactivate the static password? You will have to use the OTP for further login generated by a token device/eToken mobile application.

"Your password is blocked for security reasons!
In order to get active again you have to reach a BCR agency.
Thank you!"
The current map section contains too many objects
Do you want to clear the logs?

"This term deposit was closed after the cut off time (%1$s) and so you can use the funds from the deposit only starting with the next day.
Term Deposit has been successfully closed and the money will be transferred to account number %2$s."
Complete the form and we call you
"Current location is not found. The route can't be displayed. Please activate the location services and try again"

"Hello!
In order to strengthen the security level of your Internet and Mobile Banking account, please change your initial login password need to connect into your 24 Banking account."
For a much easier access to your 24 Banking account you can choose a friendlier username(ie an \"alias\"), which you will use to connect into your 24 Banking account.
"Your application can misbehave because \"Do not keep activities\" option is enabled in Setting >> Developer options. Do you want to continue?"
If you change the environment, app will restart.
In order to finalize the transaction please accept the terms and conditions of the contract.
Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Only letters, digits, underscore (_) and one dot (.) are allowed
The user name (alias) could not be changed at this moment. Please try again later.
The User name (alias) has to start with a letter
Only letters, digits, underscore (_) and one dot (.) are allowed
The User name (alias) has to be between 6 and 30 characters
Funds in your account are insufficient
The amount is lower than the minimum allowed amount

"Click 24 Banking BCR – authentication only with password service that you own right now is limited from the available operation point of view. No payments toward 3rd parties can be made.*
In order to do the desired payments please go to any BCR branch and activate the token component of the service as well.
Your access to the application will remain the same based on the same user name and fixed password.
Supplementary you will be able to make payment orders to 3rd parties using the token that you will receive."
Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
No details available for this branch.
Budget code should contain exactly 23 numerical characters or be blank.

After the confirmation of this transaction, the call deposit account that you are using to perform the payment will be closed at the end of business day. If you want to avoid the closing of account, please review your available funds and reinitiate the transaction.
Application is available only for individuals, PFA and Micro. For Business 24 Banking BCR click
This transaction is not available in Mobile Banking service. Please access Internet Banking service in order to perform the payment.
New password must be different from the current password.
Please enter the correct current password!
Values of exact %1$d decimal places required
Order amount must not be null or negative
The username could not be remembered. Please try again.
Please enter a value for Deposit Name !
Please enter a value for Type Of Deposit !
Environment details not available currently. Please try again later.
Length of Token must be 6 digits.
Payment Orders can be programmed with maximum 90 days in advance. Please select a new date for the execution of the Payment Order
Date older than today is not allowed
Due to FATCA reasons please attend a branch in order to open the product !
Details unavailable for the moment. Please try again later.
Please check the transaction status on Transaction History page. The update may take a few minutes.
Please try again later or contact the BCR Technical Support service available 24/7
This is not a valid Romanian IBAN. Please enter again
Please insert an amount equal or higher than minimum accepted (%1$s)
Details unavailable for the moment due to daily processing procedure. Please check again later.
You have reached the maximum number of templates!
Touch 24 Banking BCR is currently not available. Please try again later
Passwords must match. Please enter the new password.
The password is not following the password policy. Please check the below information and enter the password again.
No Branch / ATM / Partners available on selected area
"No available transactions to display in the current month. Tap the screen to load older transactions."
"No available transactions to display in the searched period. Tap the screen to load older transactions."
"The current available funds is not covering the transaction's value and possible commissions. Please review your available funds and reinitiate the transaction."
The operation cannot be done at this time. Please try again later.
The password has expired and a new one is required. Please reset your password by accessing \"Reset Password\" link from the login screen or call Contact Center.
The User name or the Password is incorrect. Please try again.
The Username or the Password is incorrect. You may try one more time.
Please enter a value for Payee Identification number!
Payee name is empty. Please enter the details
Payee IBAN is same as Payer IBAN
Enter a value for this field
Enter the details without special characters
Please try again later or contact the BCR Technical Support service available 24/7
An error occurred while processing your payment. Please contact helpdesk
The current operation is not possible at this moment. Please try again later or contact BCR Technical Support service available 24/7
Please check the transaction status on Orders Status page. The update may take a few minutes.
Please enter a phone number starting with 07 with maximum 10 digits.
In order to be able to reset your password you should first put a phone number where you could receive it.
Minimum amount for BCR Prudent is 35 RON.Please enter a new transfer amount, equal or higher than minimum amount.
Please insert an amount equal or higher than minimum accepted for BCR Prudent (35 LEI)
Please enter your password or security code. Insert again your credential.
Transaction session expired. Please obtain the quotation again
The savings accounts list could not be displayed. Press the refresh button in order to reload this page.
Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
The personal template could not be saved.

"You cannot open a deposit at the moment through Touch 24 Banking because you need to fill out a form to update information. The only way to access the form is to open a deposit via Click 24 Banking. After filling out the form you'll be able to open a deposit through the mobile application also."
Your security code is wrong. Insert again your credential.
This supplier is no longer available. The personal template saved for this provider can no longer be used.
The current operation is not possible at this moment. Please try again later or contact BCR Technical Support service available 24/7
You already have a template with this name. Please choose a different name.
Template not found. Please use the supplier template list
No products are available for the selected currency.
You entered a wrong token code. Please try again
"For security reasons your access to 24 Banking BCR has been blocked. Please contact BCR Technical Support service available 24/7"
Your eToken application is inactive. Please contact BCR Technical support for activation – 0800.801.227.
You entered a wrong token code. You have one more try left. Please try again
Your access to mobile banking is blocked. For unlock your access please contact our Contact Center (available 24/7) from the Contact section.
"Service unavailable. Please try again later or contact the BCR Technical Support available 24/7"
The search could not be finished. Please try again later
Due to timeout, for security reasons, your session has expired. You need to login again
The Touch 24 Banking app that you are using may not be the latest version offered by BCR. Please update the app from Google Play to continue the current operation.
If you have hardware token, generate the DS code (key 3) in order to sign the transaction by using the amount and the digits marked above with green.
Do not show this message again
To log into your Mobile Banking account, choose the desired authentication method from above. We will remember your option.
For more details about the funds managed by SAI Erste Asset Management SA you can
For more details please visit the website
For more details you can contact us at the BCR 24 Banking Support over phone at 0800 801 227 (021 407 4200 for international calls) or by email at
Your request has been successfully forwarded.
Allow \"Touch 24\"to access your location while you use the app.
Welcome to your Mobile Banking app!
You’re the first one to find out about the surprises we have in store for you.
You are out in the city looking for a BCR branch or ATM nearby?
Use only your fingerprint to login!
Keep in touch with your money!
Nobody can run away from bills, but why worry about them?
You can quickly pay back what you spent on your credit card
This is the place for your foreign exchange needs
Instant authorization of your transactions via eToken straight from the app!
Here you will find our latest Press Releases and Investor Relations
Changing the language will forcefully logout you from the authenticated area.
Do you really want to leave the authenticated area?

"You do not have enough funds to make this payment at the moment. Feed your account with the necessary amount until the end of the banking day or else the payment will not be performed.
The operation was completed successfully."
Please find the logs as attachment
Investment funds are an effective and inexpensive way to invest in a variety of products from the market.
To benefit from the advantages of using a credit card call InfoBCR (toll free) and together with one of our operators obtain directly the approval.
Call InfoBCR (toll free) and ask for a loan and together with one of our operators obtain directly the approval.

In order to open new term deposits or savings accounts you can access Click 24 Banking BCR desktop (PC) version or you can call Alo 24 Banking BCR and perform the operation together with one of our operators.
There is no available app to open this attachment.
The scan option is not available for this bill. Please select the provider from the list and check the bill details.
There is no email application installed.
"The number cannot be dialed from the application. Please take the displayed number and dial directly from the phone"
No ongoing clearings found at the moment
"No available transactions to display in the current month. Tap the screen to load older transactions."
"No available transactions to display in the searched period. Tap the screen to load older transactions."

The operation will be executed according to the details inputted in the previous screen and validated in this page by pressing the bellow \"Finalize operation\" button without the need of any other authorization code.
Thank you for your interest in our offer. The Personal Banker will contact you as soon as possible.
Thank you for your interest in our offer. One of our specialized operators will contact you as soon as possible.
You expressed your agreement to receive this offer and we are waiting for you to discuss with the Personal Banker.
You expressed your agreement to receive this offer and we are waiting for you in any BCR unit.
"Your password was transmitted to the registrated phone number. Receiving the SMS may last several minutes."
The password must contain at least 8 alphanumeric characters
The password must contain up to 16 characters
The password must contain letters and at least a numerical or a special character
The password may not contain the username or alias
The username (Alias) cannot be the same with the password
The password may not contain substrings of 4 identical chars; (ex:\"passssword\")
The password may not contain substrings of 4 consecutive chars; (ex: \"pass1234\")
Please enter a value for Payee IBAN
* bill payments from the app and direct mandate creation from desktop version are allowed toward suppliers predefined by the bank.
Your request has been successfully forwarded. Please check the transaction status on Order Status.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this personal template?
"For planning the route the App needs to be closed. Do you want to use the routing function of your phone now?"

"In order to better secure your account, the password will be re-issued every 3 months.
Similar to the initial activation process, we will send the password to the phone number your registered with us.
Please press the \"Send password\" button below. In a few moments you will receive the new password via SMS, and you will be able to use it right away.
In case you don't receive the password in reasonable time, please contact our Technical Support service 24/7 at 0800.801.BCR (227).
Thank you,
the BCR Team"

"Are you sure you want to reset the password?
A new password will be issued and sent to your mobile phone.
In case you don't receive the password, please call us 24/7 to the Technical Support service at 0800.801.BCR(227)"

"Hey look! It's something new!""
Now you have "quick and easy" access to all options.
Click the "menu icon to see it in action!
Find out what you can do in just a few seconds.
We’ll send you private messages anytime we have something new to tell you.
Use the auto-localization feature and you’ll find us immediately.
If you have a compatible smartphone, enter your username, scan your fingerprint and that’s it.
Real-time information about your accounts, current balance and transaction history.
between your own accounts, to family and friends, and pay your bills and taxes.
Use the predefined templates and don’t worry about supplier details anymore.
If you received it via post or e-mail.
and you’ll have more time to think about what else you want to buy for yourself.
because you benefit from lower rates for your preferred foreign currencies.
*The payment will not be saved as a personal template if you do not enter a name for the template
Type a template name in order to save this payment as a Personal Template
Press OK to be able to save the template and authorize the transaction
Touch 24 Banking BCR is currently not available. Please try again later
In order to finalize the operation you will need to sign it with unique code. Please make sure that you have the token at your disposal prior to complete the payment order bellow.
"This transaction requires validation with unique approval code. Please make sure that you have the Token device/eToken at your disposal prior to completing the payment details."
